full_text:
Nov 7, 2019
"Masochists only, please!"
Current Employee - Supervisor in Claycomo, MO
Doesn't Recommend
Neutral Outlook
I have been working at Ford Motor Company full-time for more than 3 years
Pros
The money is awesome. Great benefits.
Cons
Abusive working environment and world-class micromanagement. You will be yelled at daily, sometimes more. Management will lie to your face and smile while they're doing it. The abuse you'll take daily will be so bad that your own employees will come to you to comfort you and express their regret over the abuse that you receive.

You will ask yourself each day whether the money is worth it. You will hate returning...
Show More
Advice to Management
Management doesn't accept advice. Don't waste your time.
Helpful

I worked at Ford Motor Company

Nov 6, 2019
"Empresa responsável para com o trabalhador,"
Former Employee - Auditor De Qualidade in Camaçari, Bahia
Recommends
Positive Outlook
I worked at Ford Motor Company full-time for more than 10 years
Pros
Ótima empresa para trabalhar, moderna, automatizada, cumpre com a legislação.
Cons
Falta treinamento da Liderança. Falta um plano de cargos e salários.
Advice to Management
Treine a liderança de vocês , uma empresa não é composta apenas de robôs.
